about_the_game:
BeetleQuest 2 is a point & click adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on their second adventure.

Join Dagmar, Magnus and Boris on a quest to help the beetle witch Frigga get back her magic spell. Someone has gotten into her cottage and stolen her spell that brings things to life, and the thief is using it everywhere!

Now, all across the land things are coming alive, causing all kinds of mayhem!

Search for the magic spell in forests and hills, in dark caves, snowy mountains, and even in a spooky castle. Solve puzzles on the way and meet with strange and friendly, or not so friendly, creatures.

So strap on your backpack and prepare your wits, and get ready for an adventure of epic beetleness!

A series of adventures


BeetleQuest 2 is the second game in the BeetleQuest series.

BeetleQuest 2 is a point & click adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on their second adventure.

Join Dagmar, Magnus and Boris on a quest to help the beetle witch Frigga get back her magic spell. Someone has gotten into her cottage and stolen her spell that brings things to life, and the thief is using it everywhere!

Now, all across the land things are coming alive, causing all kinds of mayhem!

Search for the magic spell in forests and hills, in dark caves, snowy mountains, and even in a spooky castle. Solve puzzles on the way and meet with strange and friendly, or not so friendly, creatures.

So strap on your backpack and prepare your wits, and get ready for an adventure of epic beetleness!

A series of adventures


BeetleQuest 2 is the second game in the BeetleQuest series.
name: BeetleQuest 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 1.8Ghz+ (approx)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-Dedicated (shared) video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Video Card with at least 512MB VRAM & openGL 2.0 support (non-dedicated video cards starting from HD3000 onwards)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card

short_description: BeetleQuest 2 is a point & click adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on a great adventure to search for a magic spell that brings things to life. The spell has been stolen from the beetle witch Frigga, and the thief is using it everywhere, causing all kinds of mayhem!
